price: 24. (Alle wuxuu odhan) Ku tuura Naar gaal kastoo xaq diiddo ku madax adeegay.
arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alqiyā fī jahannama kulla kaffārin ʿanīdin
